body.name: Shredded Memory Foam Pillow Queen Size Set of Two Bamboo Cooling Adjustable Firm &Soft Support for Side Back & Stomach Sleepers with Removable Cover
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 14 hrs 20 mins
features: Adjustable Firm - Our memory foam pillows are filled with ample shredded memory foam and come with zippered inner and outer covers that allow you to customize your own bed pillow by adding or removing fillings, ensuring you find your ideal level of comfort. whether you sleep on your side, back, or stomach, this adjustable pillow is perfect for you!

Cooling & Bamboo Pillow - We use different materials for the A/B side of the cover. The cool side is made of cool ice silk fabric, it can keep you cool and dry all night long. and the soft side is made of 45% bamboo rayon and 55% polyester，which is breathable and soft to the touch.

Soft & Supporting - This standard-sized pillow is made of 90% shredded memory foam and 10% microfiber, providing even support to your neck and reducing shoulder pain. It combines the benefits of a memory foam pillow for better support and a regular bed pillow for softness. You can sleep longer without discomfort or pain.

Worry-Free Quality - Our fluffy pillows are CertiPUR-US certified for health and quality. We use clean, new cross-cut memory foam and microfiber blend for the fill. Enjoy a peaceful night's sleep with confidence.We filled all the extra filling inside the pillow, so the package contains only 2 heavily filled shredded sponge pillows Standard size 2 pack,(20"X26")

Beautiful Gift & Excellent Service - We are committed to providing you with the perfect sleep companion! Bafode memory foam pillow set of 2 suit for all year use and great for all age people longing for deeper sleep, perfect Christmas gifts, If you have any question, please connest us in time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars lovvveeee that this pillow is adjustable
reviews.reviewText: My partner and I have different sleeping positions so these adjustable pillows are perfect. Also love the cooling feeling. From the form I took out of my pillow (I like pillows on the flatter side) I was able to make my kid his own comfy pillow. PS I would give the pillows 30-60mins to fully extend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Somehow, I figure I just got lucky that I could find and afford these pillows.If someone divorced me, and said I would have to pay double to get these pillows back in the settlement, I would say, "What's your point?"

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A good pillow but over-stuffed
reviews.reviewText: When buying this pillow I did see that it had a zipper and you could remove some of the stuffing as a feature. Well once I received the pillows, both my wife and I felt they were over-stuffed. Our 1st night was pretty rough, so the next night we remove roughly 50% of the stuffing and now it feels great to sleep on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These pillows are worth it! I love pillows and have 6 on my bed these are my favorite. I bought them hoping they would help my husband with his neck pain. They do come super stuffed and you can add or remove fluff as needed. I read the other reviews saying they were provided with extra stuffing mine did not come with the extra but they have plenty of it in the pillows already. I would buy them again. Now just waiting to see how they hold up over time!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The review are true I love these pillows. I have 4 delivered today and I’m already ordering more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not ready to use. Has to be “fluffed” by the customer. Can’t use for 24-48 hours.
reviews.reviewText: This product was vacuumed packed and needs to be fluffed and allowed to sit for 24-48 hours before using. There is nothing in the description about this. It is ridiculous. Terrible way to send merchandise. It is junk as far as I am concerned.I rate it a minus 1.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars SUPER FIRM, but can be adjusted ...
reviews.reviewText: Everything was VERY well packaged. The way these were packaged was a bit different than any other vacuum sealed packaging items I've received. Each pillow was vacuumed sealed in a heavy duty plastic and rolled tightly in that same plastic. The box felt hefty, so much so, that when I opened it, I did weigh the rolled up pillows. They each weighed just over 3 lbs. Also in the box were two packages of extra "fluff," in case you wanted to customize the firmness. After opening, and unrolling the pillows, I could see that they each have a zippered pillow case and another zippered case that contains the "fluff." There were no specific instructions, so I threw the outer pillow cases in the wash and the inner "fluff" within it's case, in the dryer for approximately 15 minutes. The pillows came out of the dryer super fluffed up and they are, very much, memory foam. Initially, because of the appearance of the fluff, I wasn't convinced that the pillow was going to, actually, perform like a memory foam, but it does. For any who might be wondering, there was no chemical odor. There was a very slight scent of something, but it wasn't off putting or like chemicals. For lack of a better word, it was sort of like fabric, or maybe a scent from the manufacturing facility. I did not find it offensive, at all, and only very slight (I have an incredibly sensitive nose). The outer pillow cases washed/dried beautifully. As far as sleeping on them, I would call them SUPER firm, just as they are. I cannot imagine anyone wanting a firmer pillow. In fact, I will be removing some of the fluff, as I prefer firm, just not THIS firm. I think it's really good that they include extra fluff. Maybe with time, it will be needed. Worth mentioning that getting the pillow into the pillow case, once washed, was not too difficult. As can be seen on the Amazon site, there are kind of points on one side of the pillow, so a little work is required to get everything right. I think they're really nice pillows and the "push back" of the memory foam is just right ... just a little too much is stuffed in the pillow, though, for my preference.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Very soft and comfy, zippers are terrible
reviews.reviewText: These were great pillows besides the fact that the zippers barely worked at all and one even broke. The pillows were too firm at first so I took out some memory foam and then it got stuck and wouldn’t close. It was a pain just to get it open. Bummed that I can’t give this one a great rating.
